data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 3 FJ Auf den Hochdruckreiniger K 3 FJ ist Verlass: Der starke Helfer ist ideal für leichte Verschmutzungen auf kleinen Gartenflächen und Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln, Autos & Co. Inkl. Schaumdüse. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.676-538.0 ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155702
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4.3
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 7
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 242 × 285 × 805
## Ausstattung
Schaumdüse [ ]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo gebrauchsfertig RM 562
Hochdruckpistole C 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]
## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit has a tall handle for easy transport, two wheels at the base, and a prominent on/off button. The body of the washer is primarily yellow with black accents, including a vented section for airflow. ### Components Included: 1. **Main Pressure Washer Unit**: - Color: Yellow and black - Features: Tall handle, wheels, on/off button 2. **Spray Gun**: - Color: Black with a yellow trigger - Function: Used to direct the water spray 3. **Two Spray Lances**: - Color: Black - Purpose: Attach to the spray gun for different spray patterns 4. **Detergent Bottle**: - Small, white bottle - Used for applying cleaning solutions 5. **Detergent**: - Bottle with label - Contains cleaning solution for use with the pressure washer ### Additional Details: - The pressure washer is designed for easy mobility and storage, with a compact form factor. - The components are laid out neatly, indicating they are part of a set. - The design suggests it is suitable for home use, likely for cleaning cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation featuring a large numeral "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping the right side of the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** This text is bold and capitalized, emphasizing the brand's claim to being the top in its category. The use of contrasting colors (gray and yellow) helps the text stand out, making the message clear and attention-grabbing. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. The text is in a simple, bold font, emphasizing the origin of the product. ## Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt above it, indicating electrical power or energy. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased power or energy efficiency. The use of bold colors and simple imagery conveys a message of enhanced performance or capability. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, represented by a series of lines. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating adjustable power or pressure settings. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, suggesting a focus on visibility and caution. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized depiction of a star and a trophy in the center, also in white, set against a blue circle. Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capitalized letters. This text is in white on a gold background. The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record. I'm unable to view the image you uploaded. Could you please describe its content or provide more details? I'm sorry, I can't assist with that.

## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 3 FJ

Auf den Hochdruckreiniger K 3 FJ ist Verlass: Der starke Helfer ist ideal für leichte Verschmutzungen auf kleinen Gartenflächen und Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln, Autos & Co. Inkl. Schaumdüse.

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155702
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4.3
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 7
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 242 × 285 × 805

## Ausstattung
Schaumdüse [ ]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo gebrauchsfertig RM 562
Hochdruckpistole C 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit has a tall handle for easy transport, two wheels at the base, and a prominent on/off button. The body of the washer is primarily yellow with black accents, including a vented section for airflow.

### Components Included:

1. **Main Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - Color: Yellow and black
   - Features: Tall handle, wheels, on/off button

2. **Spray Gun**: 
   - Color: Black with a yellow trigger
   - Function: Used to direct the water spray

3. **Two Spray Lances**: 
   - Color: Black
   - Purpose: Attach to the spray gun for different spray patterns

4. **Detergent Bottle**: 
   - Small, white bottle
   - Used for applying cleaning solutions

5. **Detergent**: 
   - Bottle with label
   - Contains cleaning solution for use with the pressure washer

### Additional Details:

- The pressure washer is designed for easy mobility and storage, with a compact form factor.
- The components are laid out neatly, indicating they are part of a set.
- The design suggests it is suitable for home use, likely for cleaning cars, patios, or outdoor furniture.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation featuring a large numeral "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping the right side of the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

This text is bold and capitalized, emphasizing the brand's claim to being the top in its category. The use of contrasting colors (gray and yellow) helps the text stand out, making the message clear and attention-grabbing.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. The text is in a simple, bold font, emphasizing the origin of the product.

## Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt above it, indicating electrical power or energy. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased power or energy efficiency. The use of bold colors and simple imagery conveys a message of enhanced performance or capability.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, represented by a series of lines. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating adjustable power or pressure settings. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, suggesting a focus on visibility and caution. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized depiction of a star and a trophy in the center, also in white, set against a blue circle.

Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capitalized letters. This text is in white on a gold background. The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record.
I'm unable to view the image you uploaded. Could you please describe its content or provide more details?
